item.title: Dream
item.description: ##09:25 Monday 19 January 2015 JST## Fred and I were going opposite directions on the train between Shibuya and Ebisu; I got on the train as he got off. We waved to each other, doing huge waves so we could see each other even as the train was fully outside the station; I was running back and forth along the seats as my wave so he could see the motion, and I could see he was doing something equally wavy and we could see each other all the way until I arrived at Shibuya station where I realized I was walking in my underwear, but holding a briefcase through the area and then walking toward the train station, some guys were like, "
